# AudioComponentGetLastActiveTime(_:)

**Function**

The time at which the application publishing the component was last active.

## Declaration

```swift
func AudioComponentGetLastActiveTime(_ comp: AudioComponent) -> CFAbsoluteTime
```

## Inter-App Audio

- **AudioOutputUnitPublish(_:_:_:_:)**: Registers an audio output unit for use by other applications.
- **AudioOutputUnitGetHostIcon(_:_:)**: The host app’s icon.
- **AudioComponentGetIcon(_:_:)**: The UIImage of the audio component’s icon.
